wordpressPost.title: See you next year
wordpressPost.content:
During four fantastic days in Tøyenparken and lots of club shows, thousands of people enjoyed themselves with great music. The feedback from the public, artists, partners and the media makes us confident that Tøyenparken is the perfect festival area for Øya in the next few years. We are looking forward to plan next year’s festival, and is overwhelmed by all the praise during our first year in this park.

It’s time to thank the volunteers, artists, audience and partners for the best working week we can remember. Our goal was to make the best possible Øya, and we succeeded. This year’s festival must have set a new Norwegian record in festival happiness. See you in 2015!

 

photo Eystein Kolstø Strømøy

messages.newsletter.consentLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions
messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
